application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 31.6 (Validation Repot) in relation to Phase 1BS Remediation sub zone area covering Plot 12 RMA curtilage (LPA ref:17/6662/RMA), Phase 1C Remediation sub zone area covering Plot 13 RMA curtilage (LPA ref:18/6637/RMA); Phase 2 (South) Remediation sub zone area covering Plot 14 RMA curtilage (LPA ref:20/5690/RMA); section of Claremont Park Road (Part 2) and High Street South (East Section only) RMA curtilage (LPA ref:20/5534/RMA) of planning permission F/0467/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood. Discharge is sought to the extent of plot development and highways and public realm as shown on Figure 1: Planning Boundaries Relationships to Galldris Works Packages Boundaries (Brent Cross Package 1.2+ Validation Report. Ref: BXS-PK001-INF000-C-WIE-RP-11-079-XX Rev P06), excluding Claremont Park (LPA ref:19/2291/FUL) and Phase 1 (South) Highways works (LPA ref: 18/6645/FUL)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
